name: Call of Pokemon
description:
Call of Pokemon is a game by ItsIceCreeperPE trying to combine Pokemon and Call of Duty for a friend's chrismas and birthday present.

PC: 

Use Arrow Keys to move and press Enter to shoot and press Space to jump

Mobile: 

Use D-Pad to move and press Fire button to shoot and Up button to jump

GAME WAS RUSHED!!!

WARNING: MAY LAG EVERY NOW AND THEN WHILE MOVING, ANDROID BUILD DOESN'T WORK SO PLAY WEB BUILD IF USING ANDROID DEVICE!
